mapper.sql: id, Project_ID, Pile_Number, Start_Time, End_Time, Pile_Length, Guniting_Second, Total_Liquid, Total_Cement, Max_Down_Speed, Max_Up_Speed, Max_Inside_Power, Max_Outside_Power, Max_Lean, Mix_Station_Number, Guniting_Begin_Time, Guniting_End_Time, Pile_Driver_Number, Create_Time, Change_Time, Section_Number, Pile_Status, xmid, zjid, Enlarge_Top, Enlarge_Bottom, Enlarge_Height, t_yl, t_cxs, t_jxs, sjzc, zhl, zjl, sj_zc, sj_hl, sj_jl, upid,Score
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from v_pile_section_view
order by ${orderByClause}

select
distinct
from t_luding_pile_info
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into t_luding_pile_info (id, Pile_Number, Start_Time, End_Time, Pile_Length, Guniting_Second, Total_Liquid, Total_Cement, Max_Down_Speed, Max_Up_Speed, Max_Inside_Power, Max_Outside_Power, Max_Lean, Guniting_Begin_Time, Guniting_End_Time, Pile_Driver_Number, Create_Time, Change_Time, Section_Number, Pile_Status, xmid, zjid, Enlarge_Top, Enlarge_Bottom, Enlarge_Height, t_yl, t_cxs, t_jxs, sjzc, zhl, zjl, sj_zc, sj_hl, sj_jl, upid ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pileNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{pileLength,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{gunitingSecond,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{totalLiquid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalCement,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{maxDownSpeed,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{maxUpSpeed,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{maxInsidePower,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{maxOutsidePower,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{maxLean,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{gunitingBeginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gunitingEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{pileDriverNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{changeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sectionNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pileStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{xmid,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{zjid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{enlargeTop,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{enlargeBottom,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{enlargeHeight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tYl,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{tCxs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tJxs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sjzc,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{zhl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{zjl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sjZc,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sjHl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sjJl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{upid,jdbcType=TINYINT} )

id,

t_yl,
t_cxs,
t_jxs,
sjzc,
zhl,
zjl,

sj_hl,
sj_jl,
upid,

mapper.update:
update t_luding_pile_info
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Pile_Number = #{record.pileNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Start_Time = #{record.startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
End_Time = #{record.endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Pile_Length = #{record.pileLength,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
Guniting_Second = #{record.gunitingSecond,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
Total_Liquid = #{record.totalLiquid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
Total_Cement = #{record.totalCement,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
Max_Down_Speed = #{record.maxDownSpeed,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
Max_Up_Speed = #{record.maxUpSpeed,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
Max_Inside_Power = #{record.maxInsidePower,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
Max_Outside_Power = #{record.maxOutsidePower,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
Max_Lean = #{record.maxLean,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
Guniting_Begin_Time = #{record.gunitingBeginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Guniting_End_Time = #{record.gunitingEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Pile_Driver_Number = #{record.pileDriverNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Create_Time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Change_Time = #{record.changeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Section_Number = #{record.sectionNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Pile_Status = #{record.pileStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
xmid = #{record.xmid,jdbcType=TINYINT},
zjid = #{record.zjid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Enlarge_Top = #{record.enlargeTop,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
Enlarge_Bottom = #{record.enlargeBottom,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
Enlarge_Height = #{record.enlargeHeight,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
t_yl = #{record.tYl,jdbcType=TINYINT},
t_cxs = #{record.tCxs,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
t_jxs = #{record.tJxs,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
sjzc = #{record.sjzc,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
zhl = #{record.zhl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
zjl = #{record.zjl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
sj_zc = #{record.sjZc,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
sj_hl = #{record.sjHl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
sj_jl = #{record.sjJl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
upid = #{record.upid,jdbcType=TINYINT},

update t_luding_pile_info set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Pile_Number = #{record.pileNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Start_Time = #{record.startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, End_Time = #{record.endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Pile_Length = #{record.pileLength,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, Guniting_Second = #{record.gunitingSecond,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, Total_Liquid = #{record.totalLiquid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, Total_Cement = #{record.totalCement,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, Max_Down_Speed = #{record.maxDownSpeed,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, Max_Up_Speed = #{record.maxUpSpeed,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, Max_Inside_Power = #{record.maxInsidePower,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, Max_Outside_Power = #{record.maxOutsidePower,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, Max_Lean = #{record.maxLean,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, Guniting_Begin_Time = #{record.gunitingBeginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Guniting_End_Time = #{record.gunitingEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Pile_Driver_Number = #{record.pileDriverNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Create_Time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Change_Time = #{record.changeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Section_Number = #{record.sectionNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Pile_Status = #{record.pileStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, xmid = #{record.xmid,jdbcType=TINYINT}, zjid = #{record.zjid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Enlarge_Top = #{record.enlargeTop,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, Enlarge_Bottom = #{record.enlargeBottom,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, Enlarge_Height = #{record.enlargeHeight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, t_yl = #{record.tYl,jdbcType=TINYINT}, t_cxs = #{record.tCxs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, t_jxs = #{record.tJxs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, sjzc = #{record.sjzc,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, zhl = #{record.zhl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, zjl = #{record.zjl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, sj_zc = #{record.sjZc,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, sj_hl = #{record.sjHl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, sj_jl = #{record.sjJl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, upid = #{record.upid,jdbcType=TINYINT}
mapper.select: SELECT a.section_id sectionId, a.section_Name sectionName, a.c allQualified, a.s allUnqualified, b.cd thedayQualified, b.sd thedayUnqualified FROM ( SELECT section_id, section_Name, count(score) c, sum(score) s FROM pile_section_view WHERE user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY section_id, section_Name ) a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT section_id, section_Name, count(score) cd, sum(score) sd FROM pile_section_view WHERE user_id = #{userId} and pile_start=#{dateInfo} GROUP BY section_id, section_Name ) b on a.section_id = b.section_id
